sentences.en: Alex: Marty, come on! What would Connecticut have to offer us?
sentences.cn: 亚力克斯: 玛蒂, 拜托! 康涅狄格州能有什么给我们 呢 ?

sentences.en: And a job with an international marketing company in Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 还有康涅狄格州一家国际营销公司的工作.

sentences.en: Carrie : Hey , I didn ? t even ask what you were doing in Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 嘿, 我甚至还没问,你在康涅狄格州干什么 呢.

sentences.en: Cindy, can you show me how to call Connecticut?
sentences.cn: 辛蒂, 你能教我怎么打电话到康乃狄克州 吗 ?

sentences.en: Connecticut agreed to end its segregation of prison inmates suffering from AIDS.
sentences.cn: 康涅狄格州同意不再隔离患艾滋病的囚犯。

sentences.en: Connecticut Independent Senator Joseph Lieberman is endorsing Republican Senator John McCain.
sentences.cn: 康涅狄格州独立派参议员约瑟夫.列波曼将会票选共和议员约翰. 麦凯恩.

sentences.en: Gleen Cordinier is curator of the Whaling Museum here in Mystic , Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 格伦·迪尼埃是此地康涅狄格州米斯蒂克的捕鲸博物馆馆长.

sentences.en: Gloria: Well I hear they have wide open spaces in Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 格洛莉娅: 我听说在康涅狄格州有一块野生区.

sentences.en: He teaches at Yale University in New Haven, Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 他现在就职于康涅狄格州纽黑文市的耶鲁大学.

sentences.en: I even went so far as to look for houses in New York and Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 我甚至已在纽约和康涅狄格州找起房子来.

sentences.en: L . Walker , The Multi - State System of Ancient China, Shoestring Press, Connecticut, 1953.
sentences.cn: 沃克尔, 《古代中国的方国系统》, 鞋带出版社, 康涅狄格, 1953年.

sentences.en: Later, he played baseball at Yale University in New Haven , Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 后来, 他在耶鲁大学打棒球.

sentences.en: Nichols set off for his remote farmhouse in Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 尼科尔斯动身去他在康涅狄格州的偏僻农舍了。

sentences.en: Steven: What does it mean to the average person in Stamford, Connecticut?
sentences.cn: 史蒂文: 对于康涅狄克州斯坦福德城的普通人来说, 这有什么意义?

sentences.en: This Connecticut kindergarteners, they are reaching out in the Christmas spirit.
sentences.cn: 这是康涅狄格州的幼儿园, 他们正沉浸在庆祝圣诞节的节日气氛中.
